{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Sitecom |model=WLR-6100 |revision=v1 |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT6856 |cpu1_cspeed=700 |cpu1_cores= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6405D |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3593 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi2_chip1_model=RT3593 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327N |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''Wireless N900 Gigabit Dual-Band Router X6''' "Sitecom WLR-6100 v1 - 001" is written on label. [https://www.sitecom.com/en/wi-fi-router-x6-n900/wlr-6100/p/1593 Product page] [http://www.speedguide.net/routers/sitecom-wlr-6100-x6-n900-wireless-router-2909 On '''SpeedGuide'''] :Default IP address: 192.168.0.1 :Default login username: admin :Default login password: (sticker on the bottom of the device) ===Serial=== {{SCollapse|Original firmware Boot log (serial) |
